name: RE/Fragment
description:
You are Detective Grayson Davis, a Senior Net Investigator from the Public Net Security Bureau (NetSEc/NSB), a Pseudo-Law Enforcement and Intelligence Agency within Nova Shinjaku city. They are responsible for investigation of net-based crimes against the Corporations, and tracking down illegal AI on the Net. Investigating an abandoned building that has a suspicious footprint on the net, Grey must navigate the dangerous self-aware environment, using every NetSec trick in the book.

Talk, Stealth, or Hack your way through the abandoned Golden Heights hotel, and discover the mysteries Arvuti Industries left behind when they suddenly abandoned their newest venture.

The full version of the credits theme, Sanctuary, can be heard here:
https://soundcloud.com/mel-crosgrove/sanctuary-from-refragment?si=5af255de4dfe4e...
